title: News24.com | WATCH | WHO rebuffs claims Covid-19 was produced in a lab
description: The World Health Organisation has rebuffed theories that the Covid-19 virus was produced, or manipulated, in a laboratory.
content:
The World Health Organisation has rebuffed theories that the Covid-19 virus was produced, or manipulated, in a laboratory. 
The WHO says the virus likely spread from animals to humans, but is unsure at this stage exactly how that jump happened. It is believe… [+276 chars]
